QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Loss of a child - resources
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on the loss of a child: Bereaved Parents of the USA -- www.bereavedparentsusa.org , Helping Parents Heal -- www.helpingparentsheal.org , March of Dimes -- www.marchofdimes.org/complications/dealing-with-grief-after-the-death-of-your-baby.aspx , MISS Foundation -- missfoundation.org/ , The Compassionate Friends -- www.compassionatefriends.org ,
